text: Cinderella Liberty is a 1973 American romantic drama movie directed by Mark Rydell and based on the novel of the same name by Daryl Ponicsan. It stars James Caan, Marsha Mason, Eli Wallach, Burt Young, Dabney Coleman and Bruno Kirby and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 3 Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1974. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Rydell Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies set in Seattle Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies about prostitution Category:Movies composed by John Williams Category:Movies about the United States Navy
title: Cinderella Liberty
